name: Cold Serenity
description:
Entry for the Winter 2018 #ue4jam.  Theme was "On Thin Ice".

I decided to make something moody and atmospheric for this jam, lacking gameplay but being a real-time "thing".  It's essentially a screensaver/audio visualizer.  The audio system supports OGG format, so feel free to convert your music into that format and drop those files in the cold_serenity\ue4jam\Content\Music  directory (create the Music directory if it doesn't exist).

This raw entry version only has 1 button: Escape.  To quit.  Future versions (if any) will have input for music playback controls, user configurations, etc.

Don't hold your breath though, and do enjoy!
